description:
In these 6 hilarious shorts, Mainichi Kaasan shows us that from registering kids for pre-school to a crazy family trip to the beach, it`s no easy job being a mom!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bedwetting / Response / The Sun Roars! / Greetings / Crab Mom / Mail
べっちょり / 受けた / 太陽にほえろ / ごあいさつ / カニ母 / メール
